Translations.Text: geuga sajadeul-iyeo dangsindeul ui yongmuneun mueos-ibnikka mul-euni
geudeul-i malhagil ulineun joeag e ppajin baegseong-ege bonaeeojyeo
geudeul wie chalheulg-ui dol-eul bisbalcheoleom bonaeni
geugeos-eun joejieun jadeul-ege ju nim-ui pyosiga jjeoghyeo bonaejin geos-ila hadeola
geuttae hananim-eun geugos-e iss-eossdeon mid-eum-eul gajin sindodeul-eul guhanola
geuleona hananim-eun han gajeong oeeneun eotteon museullimdo balgyeonchi moshayeo
museoun jingbeol-eul dulyeowo haneun geudeul-eul wihae geugos-e yejeung-eul namgyeo dueossnola
mose-ui iyagi sog-edo yejeung i issnani bola hananim-eun geuege myeongbaeghan gwonneung-eul jueo palao-ege bonaessnola
geuleona geuneun geuui gundaewa deobul-eo oemyeonhamyeo geuneun masulsainga animyeon michin jainga lago malhayeoss deola
geulihayeo hananim-eun geuwa geu ligo geuui gundaeleul pohoeghayeo bada sog-e deonjyeoss-eumae geue daehan binan-eun dang-yeonhaessdeola
adeuui baegseong sog-eseodo yejeung i issnani bola hananim-i geudeul-e ge pamyeol-ui balam-eul bonaess-euni
balam-i bul-eossdeon gos-eneun amugeosdo namgyeojin geos-eobs-i jaecheoleom pagoe doeeo beolyeossdeola
samudeu baegseong sog-eseodo yejeung i iss-eoss-euni bola jamsidong-an hyanglag hagoja hayeoss-eudoe
geudeul-eun junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul geoyeog hayeoss-eumae jikyeobodeon jingbeol-ui gwang-eum-igeudeul-eul myeolmangke hayeossdeola
geudeul-eun il-eoseol sudo eobs-eossgo seuseuloleul bohohal sudo eobs-eossnola
geudeul ijeon-ui noaui baegseongdo geulaess-euni geudeuldo saaghan baegseongdeul-ieossnola
hananimkkeseo haneul-eul dusa gwon neung-gwa neunglyeog-eulo nop-i dugo neolbge dusyeoss-eumyeo
daejileul dudoe neolbge pyeolchyeoss-euneo eolmana aleumdabge pyeolchyeo jyeossneunyo
hananim-i modeun geos-eul changjoha sidoe jaung-eul dueoss-euni ilo hayeo neohuiga gyohun-eul eoddolog ham-ila
geuleomeulo seodulleo hananimkkeloola sillo naneun geubunkkeseo neohuie ge bonaen bunmyeonghan seonjijala
hananimgwa deobul-eo daleun geos-eul sungbaehaji malla sillo naega geubun-eu lobuteo neohuiege on bunmyeonghan seonji jala
geudeul ijeon-edo seonjijaga baegseongdeul-ege wass-eudoe geudeul ttohan geuneun ma sulsayo animyeon michinjala malhaessdeola
geudeul-i seolo-ege sangsoghan yu san-ilado doendan mal-inga sillo geudeul eun omanhan baegseongdeul-ila
geuleomeulo geudeul-eul meollihala geulihamyeon munchaegbadji anh-eul geos-ila
geuleona geudaeui mesejileul galeuchila midneun sindodeul-ege yuighanila
naega yeongmawa ingan-eul changjoham-eungeudeul-i naleul seomgige halyeo ham-ila
naega geudeul-ege il-yonghal yangsig eul guhaji anihamyeo ttohan naleul bu yanghagil balajido anhnola
sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa him-ui junim-euloseo il-yonghal yangsig-eul bepuneun suyeojaisila
joejieun mulineun geudeul donglyoui muliwa yusahan beol-eul badnola geuleo meulo na-ege seodulleo guhaji anhdo log hala
geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun geunal-eul midji anihan jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eulila

neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo

neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geudeul-eun yungdan-wie noh-yeojin an laghan chimdaewie geumsillo jangsigdoen chim daee gidaege doel geos-imyeo du cheongug-uigwasil-i gakkaie issnola
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geu an-eneun nun-eul naelyeo gam-eun eotteon ingangwa yeongmado jeobchoghayeo bo ji moshan baeujaga issnani
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geudeul-eun machi lubiwa jinju gatnola
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
seon-e daehan bosang-eun seon oee daleun geos-i issgessneunyo
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
i dugaeui cheongug oeedo da leun dugaeui cheongug-i issnani
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geu du gos-eun jit-eun chologsaeg-eulojangsigdoeeo issnani
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geu du gos-eneun pungseonghage neomchineun dugaeui umul-i issnola
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geu du gos-eneun gwasilgwa jonglyeo namuwa seoglyulo pungseonghanani
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geu du gos-eneun sunjinhago aleumdaun baeujaga issnola
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
nun-eul naelyeo gam-eun baeujaga jeongja-e issnani
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
ingangwa yeongmaga seuchyeoboji a nihan baeujadeul-ila
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
geudeul-eun chologbich bangseoggwa aleum daun yungdan-e mom-eul gidaenola
neohuineun neohui junim-ui eunhye jung-eoneu geos-eul geoyeoghagessneunyo
gwonneung-gwa yeong-gwang-eulo chungmanhasin junim ileum wie chugbog-i iss-eusoseo
bulgapihan sageon-i iss-eul ttae
geugeos-i oneun geos-e daehayeo eo neu nugudo geojis-ila haji moshamyeo
eotteon mulineun gul-yog-eul bad-eul geos-i yo eotteon mulineun chan-yang-eul bad-eulila
geuttae daejiga gipsug-i heundeullil geos-iyo
sandeul-eun sansanjogag-i namyeo
meonjiga doeeo sansanhi heut-eojinila
geuligo neohuineun se mulilo bun lyudoenani
geu jung hananeun upyeon-ui donglyoga doel geos-ila neohuineun upyeon-ui donglyoga mueos-inji aneunyo
geuligo jwapyeon-ui donglyoga doel geos ila neohuineun jwapyeon-ui donglyoga mueos inji aneunyo
apseoneun jaga doel geos-ila neo huineun apseoneun ja-e daehayeo aneunyo
ideul-eun hananim gakkai gaseo
chugbog-ui cheongug-eseo gigeohanola
geugos-eneun yes seonjodeuldo iss-euna
huse-ui salamdeul-eun sosudeola
geudeul-eun geum-eulo jangsigdoen geumjwa e anj-a
seologa seolo-ege eolgul-eul ma jubomyeo gidaeni
yeong-wonhi saneun sonyeondeul-i geudeul juwileul dolmyeo
suljangwa jujeonjawa kkaekkeushan mul geuligo gadeugchan jandeullo bongsahadeola
geugeos-eulo geudeul-eun dutong-eul alh jido chwihajido anihamyeo
geudeul-eun chwihyang-e ttala gwail-eul seontaeghanola
geudeul-i wonhaneun jolyuui gogi leul jeulgimyeo
nun-i keugo aleumdaun baeuja ga iss-eumae
jal bohodoen jinjuwa gatnola
igeosdeul-eun geudeul-i haenghan geos-e daehan bosang-ila
geudeul-eun geugos-eseo mu-ighago yogdoen maldeul-eul deudji anihamyeo
danji pyeong-anhasoseo pyeong-anhasoseolaneun malman deudnola
upyeon-ui donglyoga issnani neohui neun upyeon-ui donglyoe daehayeo aneunyo
geudeul-eun gasiga eobsneun sideula namu gaunde iss-eul geos-imyeo
song-isong-i yeolmae maejhin ttalha na mu gaunde issnola
geuneul-i gilge pyeolchyeojyeo issgo
mul-i kkeunh-im-eobs-i heulleonaomyeo
pungseonghan gwail-i issnola
gyejeol-e jehanbadji anhneun geosdeul ila
nop-eun gos-e ogjwaga issnola
hananim-eun geudeul-eul wihae saelo un baeujadeul-eul dusigo
geunyeodeul-eul sungyeolke hayeoss-eumyeo
naiga gat-eumyeo salangbadge ha syeossneunila
ineun upyeon-ui donglyodeul-eul wihae seola
geu gos-eneun yes seonjodeuldo manh-eu myeo
huse-ui salamdeuldo manh-i issnola
jwapyeon-ui donglyoga issnani neohuineunjwapyeon-ui donglyoga mueos-inji aneunyo
geudeul-eun jag-yeolhaneun boljioggwa deulkkeulhneun mulsog-e issge doego
geom-eun yeongi sog-e issge doeni
siwonhan geosdo jeulgil su eobsnola
ineun geudeul-i ijeon-e jaemulgwa sachie tamnighayeo
keuge saaghago omanhayeoss-eumyeo
jug-eo heulg-idoeeo ppyeoman namneun u liga dasi buhwalhandan mal-inyo lago malhayeossdeola
uli seonjodeuldo geuleohdan mal-i yo lago malhaessdeola
illeogalodoe geuleohanila yes seonjodeuldo geuligo huse-ui salamdeuldo
moduga jal allyeojin eotteon nal sangbong-eul wihayeo dagat-i moini
banghwanghago geojishaessdeon jadeul-iyeo
neohuineun jakkumnamuleul masboli la
geuttae neohui baedeul-eun geugeos-eulo bupul-eo oleugo
geu wilo deulkkeulhneun mul-eul masimae
galjeung-e heodeog-ineun nagtaga ma sineun geosgwa gatdeola
geuleoham-i geudeul-i bad-eul bosang ui nal daejeob-ila
hananim-i neohuileul changjohayeoss-eu doe neohuineun geu jinlileul mid-eulyeo haji anhneunyo
neohuineun ingan-ui jeong-aeg-eul saeng-gaghae boassneunyo
geugeos-eun neohuiga changjohan geos-inyoanimyeon hananim-i changjohan geos-inyo
hananim-eun neohui gaunde nugu egelado jug-eum-eul ileuge hal su iss eudoe jwajeolhaji anihamyeo
neohuiui yangsang-eul bakkueo neohui ga alji moshaneun yangsang-eulo neohuileul jaechangjo hasinila
neohuineun choechoui changjoleul algo iss-eumyeonseo geugeos-eul gyohun-eulo samji anhneunyo
neohuiga ttang-e simneun ssias-eul bo ji ani haessneunyo
neohuiga geugeos-eul jalage haneu nyo animyeon hananim-i seongjangke haneu nyo
hananim-i wonhandamyeon geubun-eun geugeos-eul sansanjogag-eulo mandeusinila geuttae neohuineun bitan-e ppajimyeo
sillo jeohuineun buchaeman-eul jige doeeoss-eumyeo
modeun geos-i heosdoeeossdoda lago malhal geos-ila
neohuineun neohuiga masineun mul-eul saeng-gaghayeo boassneunyo
neohuiga bileul naelige haneunyo animyeon hananim-i bileul naelige ha neunyo
hananim-i wonhaessdamyeon geubun-eun geugeos-eul jjage hasyeoss-eulila geulaedo neohuineun gamsahalyeo haji anhneunyo
neohuiga kin bul-eul saeng-gaghayeo boassneunyo
bul-eul kyeogiwihae namuleul sim-eun jaga neohuiinyo animyeon hananim-i geugeos-eul seongjangke haneunyo
hananim-eun geugeos-eulo gyohun-i doege hayeossgo yeohaengjadeul-ege yuyong hadolog hayeossnola
geuleomeulo widaehan geudae junim ui ileum-eulo chanmihala

cheonjiui modeun geosdeul-i hananim-eulchanmihanani sillo geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila
cheonjiui wang-gug-i hananim an-e iss-eo saengmyeong-eul jusigo saengmyeong-eul as-a gasineun bun-eun geubun-isila sillo geu bun-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneunghasim-ila
geubun-eun taecho-edo gyesyeossgo ma jimag-edo gyesimyeo hyeonjonhae gyesidoe natanaji anihasina modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila

geubun-eun haneulgwa daejileul yeos-sae dong-an-e changjohan hu gwonjwalo oleusyeoss nani daeji sog-e deul-eoganeun geosgwa geugos-eseo naoneun geosgwa haneul-eseo naelyeooneun geosgwa geugos-eulo eullaga neun geos moduleul algo gyesimyeo neohui ga issneun gos-e hangsang hamkke hasimae neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul jikyeobo go gyesinila
haneulgwa daejiga hananim an-e iss-eumyeo modeun geos-i hananimkkelo gwi uihanola
geubun-eun bam-eul naj-eulo bakkusigo naj-eul bam-eulo bakkusimyeo simjung-e iss neun modeun geos-eul asinola
geuleomeulo hananimgwa geubun-ui seon jijaleul midgo geubunkkeseo neohuilo ha yeogeum sangsogke han jaemul-eul bachila mid eum-eulo jaemul-eul bachineun jadeul wie keun bosang-i iss-eul geos-ila
neohuiga hananim-eul midji anihan iyuga mueos-inyo seonjijakkeseo junim eul mid-eula chogguhayeossgo neohuiga midneunjadeul-ilamyeon geubunkkeseo neohuiwa seong-yag eul maej-eusyeossnola
geubunkkeseo geubun-ui jong-ege mal sseum-eul bonaesa neohuileul amheug-eseo gwang myeong-eulo gujehagoja ham-ini sillo hananim-eun injahasigo jaaelousi nila

hananim-ui sa-eob-eul wihae jaemul eul bachiji anihan iyuga mueos-i nyo haneulgwa daejie issneun jaemul-eun mo du hananim-ui geos-eulo jaemul-eul bachi go seongjeonhayeo seunglihan jawa geuleohji anihan jaga gat-eul su issneunyo seung lihagi jeon-e bepulmyeo seongjeonhaneun ja ga seunglihan hue bepulmyeo seongjeonhaneun jaboda keun bosang-eul badnola modue ge bosang-eul yagsoghasyeoss-eumyeo neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul jikyeobogo gyesi nila
hananim-eul wihae daebuhamae geubunkkeseo geugeos-eul dubaelo jeung-gahayeo jusini hullyunghan bosang-eul badneun ja nugu-inyo

geunal-i doemyeon neohuineun mid-eum-eulo chungsilhan namnyeoleul bolini bich-i geudeul ap-eseo geuligo geudeul-ui upyeon-e seo bichuni geugeos-i oneul-ui neohuileul wihan gippeun sosig-eulo gangmul-i heuleu neun cheongug-ila geuleomeulo geugos-eseo yeongsaenghala geugeos-i gajang keun seunglila

geunal-eneun namnyeo wiseonjadeul-i mid-eum-eulo chungsilhan jadeul-ege malhalila jamkkanman gidalyeo jusoseo jeohuido gwangmyeong-eul chajgoja habnida gwangmyeong-eul chaj eulago hani dol-agalaneun mal-i deul lideola geuttae geudeul saiga bunlidoe go mun-i hanabakk-e eobsneun byeog-i saeng-gini geu an-e issneun jadeul-egeneun geu an-ui eunhyega iss-eul geos-iyo bakk-e issneun ja-egeneun eungbeol-i iss-eulila

wiseonjadeul-i midneun jadeul-ege gohamchyeo buleulini jeohuido yeoleobungwahamkke iss-eossji anhneunyo lago hamae midneun jadeul-i sasil-ila geuleona neohui neun neohui seuseulo yuhog-e ppajigo jujeohayeoss-eumyeo uisimhayeoss-euni mu-ighan yogmang-i neohuileul gimanhayeo hananim ui eungbeol-i neohuiege ileuleossnola gimanhaneun jaga hananim-e gwanhayeo neohuileul yuhoghaessnola
geulihayeo oneul-ui neohui bosang-geum-eun sulagdoeji anihamyeo bulsinjadeul-ui geosdo geuleohamae neohuiui geojuji neun boljiog-eulo geugos-i neoui boho jayo saaghan mogjeogjila

midneun jadeul-i hananim-eul yeom-wonhaneun ma-eum-eulo geuligo gyesidoen jin lie gyeomheohan ma-eum-eul gajil ttaega doeji anhhaessneunyo geudeul-i ijeon-e seongseo leul bad-ass-euna sigan-i heuleumae ma eum-i gud-eojyeo geudeul daedasuga saag haejyeossdeola
hananimkkeseo jug-eun daejie saengmyeong-eul jusieo neohuiege yejeung-eul bo yeossnani neohuiga ihaehadolog ham-ila
jaseon-eul bepuneun namnyeoege geuligo hananim-eul wihae jaesan-eul bachi neun geudeul-eul wihae dubaeui bosang-i deohayeo jini geudeul-eun hullyunghan bosang-eul bad-eulila

hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjijaleul midneun jadeul-i jinlileul salanghaneun ja deul-imyeo junim ap-eseo jeung-eonhal jeung-in deullo geudeul-i bosang-gwa gwangmyeong-eul bad-eul jadeul-ila geuleona hananimgwa yejeung-eulgeoyeoghan jadeul-egeneun boljiog-e geocheoga jeonghaejinila

sillo hyeonseneun yuhuiwa olag-e bulgwahamyeo heosiggwa gwonsedo pungseonghan jaesangwa jasondo geuleohageoneul geugeos-eulbiyuhasa sigmul-eul seongjangke hayeo nong buleul gippeuge han hu biga naelyeo si deul-eo nuleohge doego memalla buseuleo jigo jipulagiga doen geosgwa gatdeola geuleona naeseeseoneun saaghan jadeul-ege gahoghan eungbeol-i iss-eudoe hananim kke heonsinhan ja hananim-ui gwan-yong-gwa gippeum-eul badnola sillo hyeonse-ui salm-eun hyeonheugdoen hyanglag-e bulgwahanila

geuleomeulo seodulleo junimkke yong seoleul guhago seodulleo cheongug-eulo deul la geugos-eun haneulgwa daejiui neolb-ilo ineun hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjijaleul midneun jadeul-eul wihae junbidoen gos-imyeo hananim-ui eunhyega issneun gos-ila geu bun-eun geubun-i wonhaneun ja-ege geugeos eul bepusinani hananim-eun widaehan eunhyeui junim-isila
jisang-eseo il-eonaneun jaenangwa neohuiege il-eonaneun geos-eun hananim i geugeos-eul deuleonaegi jeon-e imi gilogdoen geos-ila sillo geugeos-eun hananim kke swiun il-ila

ineun neohuilo hayeogeum jinagan ildeul-e gwanhayeo seulpeohaji aniha go neohuiege bepun eunhyee gwanhayeo jamanhaji anihadolog ham-ila sillo hananim-eun omanhago jamanhaneun jaleul salanghaji ani hasinila
seuseulo insaeghamyeo tto tain-e gedo insaeghala jong-yonghaneun jawa oe myeonhaneun jadeul-i iss-eudoe hananim-eun seuseulo chungmanhasigo chanmibadneun bun-i sila

sillo hananim-eun bunmyeonghan yejeung gwa deobul-eo geubun-ui seonjijadeul-eul bo naess-eumyeo ttohan salamdeul-i gongpyeonghage seuseuloleul indohal seongseowa gyunhyeong-eul hamkke bonaesyeossnola geuligo hananim-eun ganghan him-eul sangjinghago yeoleogajilo yuyonghan musoeleul bonaessnani iloha yeo hananimkkeseo geubungwa geubun-ui seon jijawa boiji anhneun geos-eul midneun sin doleul dobneunjaleul siheomkoja ham-ila sillo hananim-eun ganghasimgwa gwonneung-eulochungmanhasim-ila

hananim-eun noawa abeulaham-eul bonaessgo huson-eul dueo yeeonjaui ja gyeoggwa seongseoleul jueossnani geudeul jung-e neun baleun gillo indobad-eun ja iss-eoss-eu na geudeul daedasuneun saaghan jadeul-i eossdeola

hananim-eun geubun-ui seonjijadeullohayeogeum geudeul-ui baljachwileul ttaleudolog hayeoss-euni maliaui adeul yesuleul bonaeeo geuege sin-yag-eul jueossgo geu leul ttaleuneun modeun jadeul-ui simjung-e sa lang-gwa jabileul jueossnola geuleona geu deul-eun hananim-i myosahaji anihan geudeulman-eul wihan sudo saenghwal-eul chang-an hayeoss-euna hananim-eun geubun-ui gippeumman eul chuguhala haess-eul ppun-ila geuleona geudeul-eun geudeul-i haeya hal geos-eul junsu haji moshaessdeola geulihayeo hananim-eun midneun jadeul-ege geudeul-ui bosang-eul ju eoss-euna geudeul daedasuneun saaghan ja jung-e iss-eossnola

midneun jadeul-iyeo hananim-eul du lyeowohago geubun-ui seonjijaleul mid-eula geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo neohui wie geu bun-ui eunheleul dubaelo deohayeo jusil geos-imyeo neohuiga geol-eogal gil-e bich-eul jusil geos-imyeo neohuiege gwan-yong-eul be pusinani sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasinila

seongseoui baegseongdeul-eun hananim-ui eunhyeleul jejihal su eobsdaneun geos-eul al geos-ila geubun-ui eunhyeneun geubun an-e iss-eo geubun-i wonhaneun ja-ege buyeo hasinani hananing-eun widaehan eunhyeuijunim-isila
